
Question
========
  
What is the skewness of the distribution displayed on the below plot?
\
```{r USrape, echo=FALSE, results="hide", warning=FALSE, fig.height = 3, fig.width = 6, fig.path = "", fig.cap = "Rape arrests in USA (1973)"}
library(tidyverse)
library(e1071)
library(datasets)
data(USArrests)
USArrests %>%
  ggplot(aes(Rape)) +
  geom_density(fill="lightgreen") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = .5)) +
  ggtitle("Rape arrests in USA (1973)") +
  xlab("Number of Arrests per 100k Population") +
  ylab("")
```
